Name: Propulsion
About the game: Propulsion is a fast-paced 3D platformer inspired by the rocket jumping mechanic that has featured in many other games. The aim is for the player to use their rocket launcher to rocket jump across the levels as fast as possible, flying through a variety of environments, each featuring their own mechanics to spice up the gameplay. 100 Unique levels! 5 Unique environments themed around seasons! 5 Game modes (Including a Speedrun mode)! Compete against yourself to get the fastest time using a built in stopwatch!
